page.title: 19FASHION IN WESTCOTT
page.content: The people of Westcott change their fashions and lifestyles as they grow older. In summer teenage boys wear baggy trousers, white leisure boots and lightweight raincoats with a hood. The girls wear white skirts, white jackets and white shoes. In winter leisure boots are still in fashion but warmer trousers and jackets are worn by both sexes. The older people of Westcott usually just wear what is comfortable such as platform shoes and cardigans. The middle aged people wear flared jeans, striped shirts and jumpers. The ladies wear skirts, sandles and light tops. Dorking and Guildford are essential for clothes and cosmetic supplies, as there are no clothes shops in Westcott.
